      • draw

        public void draw​(GLMapView view)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable
        Renders the content in the current EGL context for the given view. Initialization of the renderer may occur following instantiation or a prior call to GLMapRenderable.release().

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface GLMapRenderable
        Parameters:
        view - The current view

      • draw

        public void draw​(GLMapView view,
                 int renderPass)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable2
        Renders the content in the current EGL context for the given view. Initialization of the renderer may occur following instantiation or a prior call to GLMapRenderable2.release().

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface GLMapRenderable2
        Parameters:
        view - The current view
        renderPass - The render pass being executed during this invocation. The value will be the bitwise-OR of any of the flags:
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SURFACE
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SPRITES
        Only content valid for the specified pass should be rendered.

      • getRenderPass

        public int getRenderPass()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable2
        Returns a flag indicating the render passes that this renderable contains content for. The returned value should be the bitwise-OR of any of the following flags:
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SURFACE
        • GLMapView.RENDER_PASS_SPRITES
        Specified by:
        getRenderPass in interface GLMapRenderable2
        Returns:
        A flag indicating the render passes that this renderable contains content for

      • checkBatchListRefresh

        public boolean checkBatchListRefresh()
        Deprecated.
        Check if this renderer is requesting a contents update via setBatch(Collection) Once checked, the value is reset to false
        Returns:
        True if update requested

      • invalidateLabels

        public void invalidateLabels​(boolean releaseAll)
        Deprecated.
        Release labels that are no longer being rendered
        Parameters:
        releaseAll - True to release all labels regardless of whether they're still in the batch list or not

      • release

        public void release()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable
        Releases any resources allocated by the renderable as a result of the invocation of the GLMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView) method. This method will be invoked when a renderable that was previously being rendered is no longer eligible for rendering (e.g. a tile that is no longer in view on the map). The renderable may be reinitialized and rendered via a subsequent call to GLMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView) in the future.

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        release in interface GLMapRenderable
        Specified by:
        release in interface GLMapRenderable2
        Specified by:
        release in interface Releasable
